SELECT COUNT(tb.id) AS total_record FROM hun_test.tb_books tb WHERE tb.del_yn <> 'Y'
AND ( tb.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR tb.author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR tb.publisher LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR tb.bookDetails LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') )

SELECT tb.id , tb.title , tb.author , COALESCE(tb.publisher, '') AS publisher , COALESCE(tb.publish_dt, '') AS publish_dt , COALESCE(tb.book_details, '') AS book_details , COALESCE(tb.isbn, '') AS isbn , tfm.file_seq AS thumb_seq , COALESCE(tbl.books_amount, 0) AS books_amount , COALESCE(tbl.sell_amount, 0) AS sell_amount FROM hun_test.tb_books tb LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id , SUM( CASE WHEN type = 'O' OR type = 'S' THEN books_amount * -1 ELSE books_amount END ) AS books_amount , SUM( CASE WHEN type = 'S' THEN books_amount WHEN type = 'R' THEN books_amount * -1 ELSE 0 END ) AS sell_amount FROM hun_test.tb_books_log tbl GROUP BY id ) tbl ON tb.id = tbl.id LEFT JOIN hun_test.tb_file_mng tfm ON tb.id = tfm.rel_pk::NUMERIC AND tfm.rel_table = 'tb_books' AND tfm.rel_column = 'thumbnail' AND tfm.del_yn <> 'Y' WHERE tb.id = #{id}
